ygData.subject: Custom Umbra Behaviors
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Is there a guide anywhere on how to implement and deploy custom behaviors in Umbra? cheers, Colin -- Colin Rosenthal PhD Senior IT Consultant Royal Danish
